item_8_analysis.title: Restrictions on Sources of Products and Services

operations_manual.requirement: Establish and operate AHS Business in compliance with Franchise Agreement and standards/specifications in Operations Manual.
operations_manual.purpose: Protect reputation and goodwill of the Marks.
operations_manual.scope: Not designed to control day-to-day operations.

software_and_internet_fee.cost: Payment of Software and Internet Fee.

online_services.requirement: Obtain website development, search engine optimization, and other online marketing services from designated suppliers.
online_services.billing: Currently billed via Software and Internet Fee, franchisor pays suppliers.

website_maintenance.franchisee_obligation: Enter into a Participation Agreement with IGX for Vendor SaaS Services.

computer_hardware_and_software.requirement: Obtain computer hardware and software meeting franchisor's minimum specifications.

mobile_device.requirement: Obtain a smart phone or other approved device meeting minimum specifications for remote email access.
mobile_device.condition: Unless an existing device is used for the AHS Business.

phone_answering.requirement: Answer AHS Business phone during regular business hours by a live person.

approved_suppliers.general_requirement: Purchase certain materials, supplies, services, and equipment from approved suppliers.
approved_suppliers.information_provision: Franchisor provides supplier information after Franchise Agreement signing.

ace_hardware_suppliers.approved_for: Certain goods, materials, supplies, fixtures, equipment, and inventory.
ace_hardware_suppliers.franchisee_obligation: Required to purchase all materials, supplies, and goods needed from an Ace Supplier.
ace_hardware_suppliers.conditions: Only when item is in stock or readily available, and competitively priced.

future_approved_suppliers.franchisor_right: May require purchase from other approved suppliers in the future.
future_approved_suppliers.notification: Franchisor will advise franchisees of these suppliers.

purchasing_flexibility.general_rule: Except as noted, may purchase products, services, supplies, fixtures, equipment, and inventory from any supplier.
purchasing_flexibility.new_supplier_approval: If a particular supplier is designated, any similar materials/services from a previously unapproved supplier require franchisor approval.

supplier_approval_process.criteria: No written criteria for supplier approval.
supplier_approval_process.franchisee_submission: May be required to submit specifications, information, or samples for review.
supplier_approval_process.review_basis: To determine if items meet franchisor's specifications and standards (quality, content, composition, service) set forth in Operations Manual.
supplier_approval_process.decision_timeline: Franchisor advises within 30 days of receiving required information.
supplier_approval_process.fees: No fee currently required for supplier approval, but may be required in the future.
supplier_approval_process.expense_reimbursement: Franchisor may require supplier to reimburse expenses incurred in determining compliance.
supplier_approval_process.revocation: Franchisor may revoke approval with written notice.

franchisor_as_supplier.current_status: Neither franchisor nor affiliate is currently an approved supplier.
franchisor_as_supplier.future_right: Reserves the right to designate itself or affiliates as approved suppliers.

vehicle_requirements.ratio: Purchase or lease one vehicle for every three craftsmen employed working an average of 30 hours per week or more.
vehicle_requirements.example: 3 craftsmen = 1 vehicle, 6 craftsmen = 2 vehicles, 9 craftsmen = 3 vehicles.

vehicle_specifications.current_recommendation: White, gray, red, or black van or truck capable of displaying required vehicle designs and logo.

additional_vehicles.approval: All vans and trucks used must be approved by franchisor.
additional_vehicles.branding: Must display approved vehicle design advertising and logo.
additional_vehicles.personal_vehicle_use: If a personal vehicle is used, franchisor may require a vehicle magnet with logo/name.

franchisor_revenue_from_suppliers.potential_source: Revenue from purchases or leases of inventory and equipment from approved suppliers.
franchisor_revenue_from_suppliers.officer_ownership: No officer owns an interest in approved suppliers.

estimated_costs.establishing_franchise: Purchases of materials meeting specifications represent approximately 8 to 15 percent of total purchases.
estimated_costs.ongoing_operations: Purchases in accordance with standards and specifications comprise 80 to 90 percent of product purchase requirements.

private_labeling.current_status: Does not privately label any products.
private_labeling.future_right: Reserves the right to do so.

negotiated_purchase_arrangements.current_status: Does not negotiate purchase arrangements (including preferred pricing) with suppliers for franchisee benefit.
negotiated_purchase_arrangements.future_right: Reserves the right to do so.

payments_from_suppliers.current_status: Does not receive payments from approved suppliers regarding franchisee purchases.
payments_from_suppliers.future_right: Reserves the right to do so.

franchisee_benefit_from_sources.general_statement: Except as described, franchisee does not receive a material benefit from franchisor based on use of designated/approved sources or purchase of particular products/services.
